name: Zombie Infinity
description:
Zombie Infinity — is an endless shooter infested with zombies. He asks one simple question - how quickly will you die?

No help will come - your continued survival depends on your own cunning, luck and ability to evade the ruthless horde.
In the city and West Point, a survivor must do everything he can to delay his inevitable death, day by day.
Let's go, soldier!

Features:
  • Accumulate points for killing zombies!
  • Set your own personal record!
  • Kill crowds of zombies!
  • Blow up the zombie crowd
  • Buy grenades for points!

-Unusual controls
-Funny music
-Convenient control
